item.description:
UPDATE: The NFL has moved the Game Time to a 4:25pm start time.  Please update your RSVPs and plans accordingly! -Isabel

==========================

 

Participating Groups are Red Sox Natives, Boston Happy Hour, Social Fun and Boston Singles

Please join us for a 2012 Red Sox Natives Exclusive Event!

Join us at Battery Park in the Financial District for a Patriots Game Viewing Party to watch the New England Patriots take on the Indianapolis Colts in Foxboro on Sunday, November 18. 

Arrive at 4:00pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game Time is Now 4:25pm.

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District in Boston.  Greg, the most excellent manager, will reserve space/tables just for our group. They have plenty of TVs and will have sound on for the game. We have attended many events at Battery Park.

Battery Park has a great selection of beer and the food is great! (Isabel raves about the Shepard's Pie!).  They also have brunch available until 3pm with a MAKE YOUR OWN BLOODY MARY BAR! (yum!) Battery Park is a short walk from Downtown Crossing (Red and Orange Lines), Government Center (Green and Blue Lines), and Aquarium (Blue Line). On street parking is available in the area. 

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.

The Red Sox Natives have organized weekly viewing parties over the last year with guests from several other invited groups (including Boston Happy Hour) attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Hope to see you there!

Space is limited.

Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Ask For The Red Sox Natives Reserved Section and Isabel
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party at Battery Park-Patriots vs Colts HOME GAME (Time Change)
